text: Alfred HouSemantic Scholar is an Anglican bishop: from 2005Anglican News to 2017Melanesian Mission he was Assistant Bishop of Malaita,MMUK one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia.ACOM ==References== Category:Bishops of Malaita Category:21st-century Anglican bishops Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Alfred Hou
